extendedInfo.description: A simple widget which displays the time, date & next calender event with time. The Analogue Clock Skin used in this widget was found here http://forum.xda-developers.com/showpost.php?p=23440052&postcount=28 THIS SEPARATE SKIN IS NOT NEEDED FOR EVENT CLOCK TO WORK, IT IS INCLUDED, I'M JUST POSTING THIS LINK TO GIVE CREDIT TO THE CREATOR AND SAY THANKS :o)You MUST have UCCW 2.1.2 or higher installed on your device or this skin WILL NOT work.****This skin will only appear in UCCW after you place a widget on your homescreen. It does not appear in your app drawer or if you open UCCW from your app drawer****Six Hotspots Hotspots available (See Picture) -Â 1. Open Alarm2. Add calendar event3. Open Calendar4. Open Calendar5. Refresh Weather (Can be used to refresh calendar event)6. Open UCCW EditorEach Hotspot can be assigned to a different app/shortcutAll text and shape colors can be changedAdding skin to your homescreen1. Add a 4x1 or 5x1 UCCW widget to your homescreen by long pressing the homescreen or browsing widgets in app drawer2. Select eventclock from UCCW menu3. RESIZE BEFORE hitting "Touch Here" (This is so that the Hotspots will be correctly aligned)4. Hit "Touch Here" to load the skin If you have any problems or queries please do not hesitate to email meEnjoy and thank you :o)
